attributes.title: no thanks💕
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app i had some hopes for cheeto,🧚🏻 ✨but as soon i as i opened the app my phone actually grew arms and legs and jumped out of my hands! 🤡👽I chased it into my sisters room and it shot a laser into her eyes and blinded her. 😱😮It ran out of her room and started a fire in mine. 🔥 My entire house proceeded to burn down. i finally caught my phone and it exploded in my hands. good thing it only disintegrated the top half of my body!☠️

attributes.title: BOO!!!
attributes.review: if there was an option to rate this app 0 stars i would WORST app ever!!!! horrible in every possible way needs to be cancelled 🥰🧚🏻‍♀️💞💁🏼‍♀️as soon as i downloaded the app my phone started GLITCHING😡😡this has never happened before. i am livid that apple would keep an app up that makes phones glitch and not to mention the ugly orange 🍊 fat man on the cover. tbh i don’t even know why i bought the app i was curious... but I HATE it.

attributes.title: GAVE MY PHONE A VIRUS
attributes.review: This terrible app gave my phone a virus. It completely shut in down. I had to get a new one. Beware if you get this app it gives your phone a virus. The Trump Virus. I would really like to speak to the developers of this app. Needs to be taken down ASAP

attributes.title: Might cause death😵
attributes.review: So I just downloaded this and now my dog ate my cat while it was having a seizure after hearing about how bad this website it. Now they are both dead which has caused my depressed grandma to now kill her self with skskskrunchie around her neck. Now I am in poverty bc we have to pay for her funeral which is lot of money. Plz don’t get the app or else your family will be dead in no time as well. Period.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app is so bad. I wanted to see trumps beautiful face but all it showed was an 🍊I was so disappointed. This app also almost killed me. So I had my phone in my pocket and all the loud notifications gave me a heart attack. Especially the fact that I would have to look at Trumps face but that’s ok. All I can say is that trump shouldn’t be president anymore. All he does is nothing and not help the country and keep Latino kids in cages.

attributes.title: Completely Letdown
attributes.review: I downloaded this to educate myself more on trump because apparently i’m in the wrong but not only did this app prove my point that he is an awful person, let alone our “president” but it also glitched my phone so bad. i took it to the shop only to waste money for nothing. the app was the problem. im tired of this boy. Even hard core trumpies don’t support him anymore. STOP the supremacy. Trump 2020🇺🇸🙈🤩in jail🤪🥺✨💫

attributes.title: This app is terrible!!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see if there was any reason to vote for Trump again, but instead all I got was a cursed photo of my dog!!!! My dog, shakira, then proceeded to murder every single member of my family!!! He also got to me!! I'm currently typing this as a ghost and I'm upset because I'm forced to now glide around seeing all the miserable souls in the US because we have such a terrible, racist, misogynistic, homophobic, and transphobic president.

attributes.title: do NOT download
attributes.review: i thought i was going to love this app as much as i love president trump but it was the opposite. it was making my phone glitch like crazy and i almost has to get a new one! once i finally got the app to work i realized that they don’t handle a lot of situations very well. whoever wrote a lot of these things was immature about it. like the saying lazy joe and other things, i want to read about trump NOT about joe biden.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: I am utterly disappointed by the construction of this app. As a coder and app creator this app could have been made way better. For being run by the government and supposed to represent the president it should have had better coders. It obviously is a representation of our current president and how he fails to get anything done that has to do with the people. Also as soon as I opened the app my cat died. So he killed my cat.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!
attributes.review: This app immediately started crashing as soon as I opened it! The color of the app icon is hurting my family’s eyes. It is not eye sensitive friendly. It’s a real eye opener because this isn’t helping ANYONE! I am extremely disappointed in this application. It asks for way too much information. They need to take this back, it’s actually irritating how it looks and the app isn’t even useful.
